messages.message:
Hey @sean.donohoe @Paul H, I was reading this doc (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TI/pages/2213183494/Use+PPY+on+Crafting) to configure my crafting with ppy and forward it to localhost but there is one problem that I face where whenever I try to access any aihub url directly except `https://localhost/` I get the screen attached. For example, if I directly go to a url something like `https://localhost/converse/01929a01-d0f4-7c36-8ace-a337a3244f21` or even reload the page it shows this error.
Do you guys know what might be the issue?
When you visit https://localhost/, what is shown on screen? Is it the IB Classic splash screen or the AIHub home page?
I would also check your browser console to see if there are any failing requests to specific URIs and/or client errors that can provide more detail
